attributes.action: Consider implementing a Ration Card to be used with valid ID for Covid-19 period
attributes.additional_details:
Advise population about not panic buying and to respect others in this sensitive period

Ask the supermarkets to better enforce restrictions on certain products, and to be aware many will buy something put it in the car and come back in and get some more from the supermarket or another one.

Brainstorm Ration Card idea if people don't respect governmental advice and from feedback from supermarkets.
attributes.background: Consider implementing a Ration Card for the Covid-19 period if the government cannot crack down on panic and bulk shoppers that dramatically hinder the population that are being sensible in this period and carefully shopping in regards to their fellow citizens.
